archimate:Capability.name: Data Corridor
archimate:Capability.documentation: The Data Corridor is the management capability that enables data to be transported and where required validated, cleansed, transformed etc, between: • Trusted sources and Data Factory components; • Data Factory components; • Data Factory components and Control Management components; and / or • Data Factory components and Information Access components. The Data Corridor is a mechanism along which data is moved and managed, and accessed by components through access doors eg ETL tool, Map-Reduce processes, SQL etc The Corridor is capable of managing data to the constraints of trusted sources and the needs of Data Factory and Information Access components. The Corridor will therefore use and support: Messaging through message brokers • Custom or COTS API’s • Code • Traditional ETL capabilities • File transfer protocols • Adaptors and Utilities from the source or target RDBMS or to allow execution of third party content, which in the case of FFFS is the Models themselves. • Map-Reduce and No SQL etc for high volume and un-structured data.
